videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Playing a blue deck without counterspells.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a monoblue devotion deck ft. Thassa, God of the Sea in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro
02:13 - Deck Tech
08:02 - vs Kellan, Inquisitive Prodigy
14:38 - vs Shelob, Child of Ungoliant
18:29 - vs Eshki, Temur's Roar
24:31 - vs Betor, Ancestor's Voice
29:08 - vs Tiamat
36:34 - vs Sidisi, Brood Tyrant
43:20 - vs Vnwxt, Verbose Host 
49:08 - vs Galadriel of Lothlórien 
54:41 - vs Tatyova, Benthic Druid 
58:29 - vs Old Rutstein
